info.name: Casino Backend API - Complete
info.description: Complete API collection for Casino Backend with all latest features including session management, notifications, and game functionality

request.description: Register a new user with automatic login and session creation
Login with session management. Response includes session info if user was logged in on another device.
Logout and invalidate session + token
Change user password (requires old password verification)
Reset user password (Admin only - no old password required)
Initialize connection to session management
Disconnect from session management
Check if the user's session is still valid. Send the sessionId from login response in the request body. Returns a forced logout message if the session is expired or replaced.
Get current user profile
Update user profile
Get all users (Admin only)

query.description: Search by username, email, or user game ID

request.description: Get users for selection in notifications (Admin only) - supports search and role filtering
Get global leaderboard
Get all active notifications for current user
Get all active notifications of a specific type (e.g., session, achievement, reward)
Get the latest active notification of a specific type
Create a new notification for current user
Mark a specific notification as read
Create a session notification (automatically created on new device login)
Create an achievement notification
Create a reward notification
Create a tournament notification
Get leaderboard for specific game
Get weekly leaderboard (auto-generated every Monday using user coin balances)
Get weekly leaderboard for specific week (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Get user's daily statistics
Get user's win history
Reset user password (Admin only)
Get all available games
Get game details by ID
Spin the slot machine with win ratio from game configuration
Simulate multiple spins and get RTP analysis
Test different win ratios without changing game configuration
Update the win ratio for a game (0.0 to 1.0)

query.description: Filter by simulation type (standard, test, override)

request.description: Get paginated list of simulation records with optional filters
Get detailed information about a specific simulation record
Spin the Cleopatra slot machine. Requires Authorization. Body: { gameId, betAmount, [winRatio] }
Start a new game session
End a game session
Get current active game session
Get user's progress for a specific game
Update user's progress for a specific game
Unlock an achievement
Get user's achievements
Get all available achievements
Get current user's achievements
Get all events
Get all active events
Get event by ID

body.raw:
{
    "title": "New Event",
    "description": "Event Description",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
    "startTime": "2024-03-20T10:00:00Z",
    "endTime": "2024-03-21T10:00:00Z",
    "isActive": true,
    "priority": 1,
    "eventBottom": "Event bottom text",
    "showOnce": false,
    "targetType": "player"
}

request.description: Create new event (Admin only)

body.raw:

request.description: Update existing event (Admin only)
Delete event (Admin only)
Get spin wheel status for current user
Spin the wheel and get reward
Get user's spin wheel history
Get daily reward status
Claim daily reward
Get user's daily reward streak count
Get all tournaments
Get tournament details by ID
Create new tournament
Join a tournament
Get current user's transactions
Get transactions for specific user (Admin only)
Add a new transaction
Get all active notifications for the current user
Get notifications by specific type (e.g., session, general)
Get the latest notification of a specific type
Mark a specific notification as read
Create a new notification for the current user
Get all active session logs for the current user (for Unity client)

item.name: Mark All Session Logs as Read

request.description: Mark all active session logs as read (for Unity client)
Get session logs by specific action (e.g., new_device_login, logout, expired)
Add a game to favorites
Remove a game from favorites
Set game as favorite using game-progress endpoint
Remove game from favorites using game-progress endpoint
Get main menu configuration
Get active login notifications for the current user
Get all active login notifications (Admin only - shows notifications for all users)
Get a specific login notification by ID

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Welcome Back!",
    "message": "We're glad to see you again. Check out our new features!",
    "targetUsers": ["user-uuid-here", "another-user-uuid"],
    "showOnce": false,
    "expiresAt": "2024-12-31T23:59:59Z",
    "type": "test image",
    "targetType": "singleuser",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/welcome-image.jpg",
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new login notification (Admin only)

request.description: Update an existing login notification (Admin only)
Delete a login notification (Admin only)
